```{python}
from sympy import *
```

```{python}
x_i, n, mu = symbols('x_i, n, mu')
```

```{python}
ss = Sum((x_i - mu)**2, (x_i, 1, n))
```

```{python}
d = diff(ss, mu)
d
```

```{python}
equation = Eq(d, 0)
equation
```

```{python}
expand(equation)
```

```{python}
simplify(Sum(2*mu, (x_i, 1, n)))
```
